articles.description: David Schumacher, the nephew of Michael Schumacher, broke his back in a fiery crash at the weekend but does not require surgery.
articles.content:
The accident happened at the Hockenheim DTM - 20-year-old Schumacher was treated at the scene but his injuries were not thought to be serious.
But former F1 driver Ralf Schumacher, his father, has s… [+1655 chars]

articles.author: Tom Coleman
articles.title: Every word from Mark Hudson as he discusses Cardiff City team news ahead of Coventry City clash - Wales Online
articles.description: Mark Hudson is set to face the media ahead of the visit of Coventry City on Saturday
articles.content:
Cardiff City press conference begins with injury news
Mark Hudson is on media duties, and Callum Robinson's injury is first on the agenda.
